content: Thank you so much for this. I was once pre-reserved a hotel that also happened to be one where FEMA had booked a large number of people. It was not a 5 star or anything. But it was nice enough to have a breakfast bar with some hot biscuits and the waffle makers …. about Hojo level. And these all these kids were very boisterous. I understood that this is the first time they may have seen this much plenty in their lives. “it’s free?” “I can have anything I want?” It was joyful and heartbreaking at the same time. And then some angry old asshole loudly complained that all this …he actually used the word “riff-raff” was ruining his day.I chewed him out. This hotel was trying to give these families and kids a few good days in recognition of what they had lost and maybe a nugget of normalcy to cling to in their uncertain future.
